page.title: 12HISTORIC BUILDINGS.STANFORD.
page.content:
THE DRUM INN in the north of Stanford
on Stone Street was one of the Duke of Wellington's recruiting bases during the Peninsula War. Farm lads would swear "on the drum" their oath to the monarch and take the King's Shilling. BLIND HOUSE, beside Blind Lane, which ran through Hayton Wood across Stone Street to Shrine Farm and beyond, before coming to a blind end.This lane has disappeared but given its house name to the road leading up to Stone Street at Gun Carriage corner. Blind House Lane being the link between Swan Lane and Stone Street.
